lead_paragraph: MERKELSON--Pearl Bienstock, of Boynton Beach, Florida died on March 9 at Delray Beach Hospital Trustbridge. Pearl grew up in the Bronx, married beloved husband, Harold, in 1941 (who died in 2010), and was for many years a school secretary in lower Manhattan in the public junior high schools. She had a wonderful spirit, broad interests and never ending love of life. She is survived by her sons, Scott and his wife, Barbara, and Wayne and his wife, Nancy, and grandsons with spouses, Adam, Heather, David, Randall, Amanda, Jeremy and Abigail. Services will be held in Manhattan at 10am on Friday, March 11, at the Riverside Memorial Chapels at 180 W. 76th St. Donations in her memory can be sent to Cornell University, 130 East Seneca St., Ithaca, NY 14850 to the Merkelson Family Scholarship in honor of Harold and Pearl Merkelson. 1/3
